con:config.con:query: update CTL_BATCH_RUN_SCHEMA set STATUS = 'FREE' where SCHEMA_NAME in (select SCHEMA_NAME from CTL_BATCH_RUN_SCHEMA order by START_TIMESTAMP asc fetch first 1 rows only)

SELECT TRANSACTIONSID,paymentstatus FROM transactions WHERE TRANSACTIONSID in (${Properties#transactionsIds}) UNION SELECT TRANSACTIONSID,paymentstatus FROM hst_transactions WHERE TRANSACTIONSID in (${Properties#transactionsIds})
